transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji hello
Executive: Kaun baat kar raha hai?
Executive: Ji main Nimit se baat kar raha hu aapke account manager hai ji aapne 9696 pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ashutosh Pandey baat kar raha hu sir haan ji to abhi phone kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan Ashutosh ji I was searching for the inquiries on IndiaMART app sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: IndiaMART app pe jo past wala jo category hai na.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Usme there are so many inquiries to wo sari sold out ho jati hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: To aapse pehle meri kisi se baat hui thi matlab do teen hafte pehle.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To unhone bataya tha ke past me ja ke I am interested pe click karoge to then that inquiry will be there but wo inquiry dikh nahi rahi mere ko uska koi contact number hai kaise connect karna hai kyuki wo sari jo mere ko inquiries chahiye hoti hai na wo sari usi me rehti hai past me hi hoti hai.
Executive: Ek minute abhi kya bolte hai abhi aap system pe hai kya?
Customer: Main system pe nahi hu but aap karenge.
Executive: Haan to aap ek baar na mail open kar lijiye please taki main aapko acche se guide kar du phone me hi.
Customer: Accha mail open karu.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Phone ya system hai to system pe on kar lijiye usme acche se aapko proper tarike se main bata dunga.
Executive: System hai na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: System me ya phone me kar rahe hai?
Customer: Phone me phone me.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai ab mail open kariye fir bataiye main aapko ek mail bhej raha hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: On kar liya aapne mail?
Customer: Haan ye mail kaun sa hai ek baar check karo na ye The Handcraft Bazar wala hai na?
Executive: Ek minute main aapko bata raha hu.
Customer: Haan wahi hai wahi hai.
Executive: Aa gaya aapke pass?
Customer: Haan aapne abhi mail kiya kya kuch?
Executive: Haan ji invitation aaya hoga ek aapke pass.
Customer: Ye kis liye hai matlab call video call hai kya isme video call nahi hai just aap join kariye kuch jaruri nahi hai ki aap video on hi karna hai bas main apni screen share karke proper tarike se main sari cheeze bata dunga.
Customer: To fir dopahar me baat karenge main thoda office me baith ke fir aaram se baat karenge.
Executive: Haan sir dopahar me matlab jyada time nahi do se do se char minute lagenge process aapko jyada time aur jo hum abhi call pe kar rahe hai na baat main abhi aapko proper tarike se bata dunga.
Customer: Jyada time nahi lagega mere ko ye mail to aayega nahi kyuki phone chalu hai.
Executive: Mail nahi aayega ek minute main pehle na aapko main line pe rahiye main aapko whatsapp isi number pe hai?
Customer: Haan whatsapp isi number pe hai.
Executive: Ek minute aap line pe rahiye pehle whatsapp pe aapko mail id main bhej sakta hu ki kis mail id pe gaya hai uske baad aapko confirm ho jaye tab aap kariye ek minute.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai main bhej raha hu.
Customer: Thik hai main band karu kya phone?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to find past inquiries.

- Wants to know how to connect to inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide via screen sharing.

- Executive sent mail ID on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check mail ID on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, past inquiries, screen sharing
